page.title: 07JOBS AND SHOPS
page.content: A lot of men in the area work at one of our local pits.Mining is the main job in our area.Some people work in an office or a shop.There is a removel firm where you could get a job driving a lorry.There is also an undertakers in Forest Town where you could get a job.For people who cannot find a job in Forest Town they have to go to work in nearby towns and cities. The shopping in Forest Town is good for the size of it.For food you will not need to go very far because there is a Tesco's hypermarket and the little food shops.There is a post office and butchers and bakers.In Forest Town there is a fishing shop which is the only one in the area. People from miles away come to it because it is very good,maybe the best in the district. {SUSAN OGDEN, DIANE HOROBIN
